document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Emveolstone Villa on the Street of the Singing Dolphin.
document_data.name: Emveolstone Villa
document_data.location: [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]] & [[Ivory Street]], [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Emveolstone Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Emveolstone]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the north section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] on the west side of the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]] where it was intersected by [[Ivory Street]]. The west side of the villa also lay on the [[Street of Whispers]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: Four separate structures were found within the walled compound arranged around a central garden that included an elongated pond. The two larger buildings lay at the northern and southern ends of the property. All of the buildings stood two or three stories tall.
